column6: In the Options menu, checking the box next to "Show Advanced Crafting Information" will show how many items the player has crafted.

Alternatively, users with access to their saved game files may find the "Stardew Checkup" utility helpful for tracking their Crafting achievement progress. The utility is located at: https://mouseypounds.github.io/stardew-checkup/
